text: Christos Charalabous (; born October 3, 1981 in Limassol) was a Cypriot football player. He became Assistant Manager of Dusan Kerkez in AEL Limassol from 2018. ==External links== * Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Cypriot footballers Category:AEL Limassol players Category:Xanthi F.C. players Category:Panthrakikos F.C. players Category:Aris Limassol FC players Category:Cypriot First Division players Category:Super League Greece players Category:Cypriot expatriate footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Greece Category:Association football midfielders
title: Christos Charalabous
